system:
note description: "[ Color modeled as red, green, blue intensities each with range [0,1]. ]" legal: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "color, pixel, rgb, 8, 16, 24" status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2016-09-23 10:05:41 -0700 (Fri, 23 Sep 2016) $" revision: "$Revision: 99187 $"
class ../interface/ev_color.xmlEV_COLOR
inherit ../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY redefine ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_is_equalis_equal, ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_copycopy, ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_outout end
FalseHASHABLE undefine ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create, ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_is_equalis_equal, ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_copycopy, ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_outout end
create ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create, ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_make_with_8_bit_rgbmake_with_8_bit_rgb, ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_make_with_rgbmake_with_rgb
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_make_with_8_bit_rgb../interface/ev_color.xml#f_make_with_8_bit_rgbmake_with_8_bit_rgb (an_8_bit_red, an_8_bit_green, an_8_bit_blue: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Create with a_red, a_green, a_blue, and default name. require red_within_range: an_8_bit_red >= 0 and an_8_bit_red <= ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_max_8_bitMax_8_bit green_within_range: an_8_bit_green >= 0 and an_8_bit_green <= ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_max_8_bitMax_8_bit blue_within_range: an_8_bit_blue >= 0 and an_8_bit_blue <= ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_max_8_bitMax_8_bit do ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_red_with_8_bitset_red_with_8_bit (an_8_bit_red) ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_green_with_8_bitset_green_with_8_bit (an_8_bit_green) ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_blue_with_8_bitset_blue_with_8_bit (an_8_bit_blue) ensure red_assigned: ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_red_8_bitred_8_bit = an_8_bit_red green_assigned: ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_green_8_bitgreen_8_bit = an_8_bit_green blue_assigned: ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blue_8_bitblue_8_bit = an_8_bit_blue end
f_make_with_rgb../interface/ev_color.xml#f_make_with_rgbmake_with_rgb (a_red, a_green, a_blue: FalseREAL_32) -- Create with a_red, a_green, a_blue, and default name. require a_red_within_range: a_red >= 0.Falseto_real and then a_red <= 1.Falseto_real a_green_within_range: a_green >= 0.Falseto_real and then a_green <= 1.Falseto_real a_blue_within_range: a_blue >= 0.Falseto_real and then a_blue <= 1.Falseto_real do ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_redset_red (a_red) ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_greenset_green (a_green) ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_blueset_blue (a_blue) ensure red_assigned: (../interface/ev_color.xml#f_redred - a_red).Falseabs <= ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_deltadelta green_assigned: (../interface/ev_color.xml#f_greengreen - a_green).Falseabs <= ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_deltadelta blue_assigned: (../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blueblue - a_blue).Falseabs <= ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_deltadelta end
feature -- Access
f_red../interface/ev_color.xml#f_redred: FalseREAL_32 -- Intensity of red component. Range: [0,1] require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xml#f_redred ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xml#f_redred end
f_green../interface/ev_color.xml#f_greengreen: FalseREAL_32 -- Intensity of green component. Range: [0,1] require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xml#f_greengreen ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xml#f_greengreen end
f_blue../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blueblue: FalseREAL_32 -- Intensity of blue component. Range: [0,1] require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xml#f_blueblue ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xml#f_blueblue end
f_lightness../interface/ev_color.xml#f_lightnesslightness: FalseREAL_32 -- Lightness of the color require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed local max_color: FalseREAL_32 min_color: FalseREAL_32 r, g, b: FalseREAL_32 do r := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_redred g := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_greengreen b := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blueblue max_color := r.Falsemax (g).Falsemax (b) min_color := r.Falsemin (g).Falsemin (b) Result := (max_color + min_color) / 2.Falseto_real end
f_saturation../interface/ev_color.xml#f_saturationsaturation: FalseREAL_32 -- Saturation of the color require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed local diff_color: FalseREAL_32 sum_color: FalseREAL_32 max_color: FalseREAL_32 min_color: FalseREAL_32 r, g, b: FalseREAL_32 do r := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_redred g := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_greengreen b := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blueblue max_color := r.Falsemax (g).Falsemax (b) min_color := r.Falsemin (g).Falsemin (b) diff_color := max_color - min_color if diff_color = 0.0 then Result := {FalseREAL_32} 0.0 else sum_color := max_color + min_color if sum_color < 1.Falseto_real then Result := diff_color / sum_color else Result := diff_color / ({FalseREAL_32} 2.0 - sum_color) end end end
f_hue../interface/ev_color.xml#f_huehue: FalseREAL_32 -- Hue of the color in radiant. Multiply by 60 to get in degree. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed local diff_color: FalseREAL_32 max_color: FalseREAL_32 min_color: FalseREAL_32 r, g, b: FalseREAL_32 do r := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_redred g := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_greengreen b := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blueblue max_color := r.Falsemax (g).Falsemax (b) min_color := r.Falsemin (g).Falsemin (b) diff_color := max_color - min_color if diff_color = 0.0 then Result := {FalseREAL_32} 0.0 else if max_color = r then Result := (g - b) / diff_color elseif max_color = g then Result := {FalseREAL_32} 2.0 + ((b - r) / diff_color) elseif max_color = b then Result := {FalseREAL_32} 4.0 + ((r - g) / diff_color) end end end
feature -- Element change
f_set_rgb../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_rgbset_rgb (a_red, a_green, a_blue: FalseREAL_32) -- Assign a_red, a_green and a_blue -- to ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_redred, ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_greengreen and ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blueblue respectively. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed red_within_range: a_red >= 0.Falseto_real and then a_red <= 1.Falseto_real green_within_range: a_green >= 0.Falseto_real and then a_green <= 1.Falseto_real blue_within_range: a_blue >= 0.Falseto_real and then a_blue <= 1.Falseto_real do ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_redset_red (a_red) ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_greenset_green (a_green) ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_blueset_blue (a_blue) ensure red_assigned: (../interface/ev_color.xml#f_redred - a_red).Falseabs <= ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_deltadelta green_assigned: (../interface/ev_color.xml#f_greengreen - a_green).Falseabs <= ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_deltadelta blue_assigned: (../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blueblue - a_blue).Falseabs <= ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_deltadelta end
f_set_red../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_redset_red (a_red: FalseREAL_32) -- Assign a_red to ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_redred. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed within_range: a_red >= 0.Falseto_real and then a_red <= 1.Falseto_real do ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xml#f_set_redset_red (a_red) ensure red_assigned: (../interface/ev_color.xml#f_redred - a_red).Falseabs <= ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_deltadelta end
f_set_green../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_greenset_green (a_green: FalseREAL_32) -- Assign a_green to ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_greengreen. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed within_range: a_green >= 0.Falseto_real and then a_green <= 1.Falseto_real do ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xml#f_set_greenset_green (a_green) ensure green_assigned: (../interface/ev_color.xml#f_greengreen - a_green).Falseabs <= ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_deltadelta end
f_set_blue../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_blueset_blue (a_blue: FalseREAL_32) -- Assign a_blue to ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blueblue. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed blue_within_range: a_blue >= 0.Falseto_real and then a_blue <= 1.Falseto_real do ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xml#f_set_blueset_blue (a_blue) ensure blue_assigned: (../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blueblue - a_blue).Falseabs <= ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_deltadelta end

f_rgb_24_bit../interface/ev_color.xml#f_rgb_24_bitrgb_24_bit: FalseINTEGER_32 -- ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_redred, ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_greengreen and ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blueblue intensities packed into 24 bits -- with 8 bits per colour and blue in the least significant 8 bits. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xml#f_rgb_24_bitrgb_24_bit ensure bridge_ok: Result = ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xml#f_rgb_24_bitrgb_24_bit end
f_set_rgb_with_24_bit../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_rgb_with_24_bitset_rgb_with_24_bit (a_24_bit_rgb: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set intensities from a_24_bit_rgb value -- with blue in the least significant 8 bits. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed within_range: a_24_bit_rgb >= 0 and a_24_bit_rgb <= ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_max_24_bitMax_24_bit do ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xml#f_set_rgb_with_24_bitset_rgb_with_24_bit (a_24_bit_rgb) ensure rgb_assigned: ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_rgb_24_bitrgb_24_bit = a_24_bit_rgb end

feature -- Output
f_out../interface/ev_color.xml#f_outout: FalseSTRING_8 -- Textual representation. local f: FalseFORMAT_DOUBLE do create f.Falsemake (6, 4) Result := f.Falseformatted (../interface/ev_color.xml#f_redred.Falseto_double) + " " + f.Falseformatted (../interface/ev_color.xml#f_greengreen.Falseto_double) + " " + f.Falseformatted (../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blueblue.Falseto_double) end
feature -- Comparison
f_is_equal../interface/ev_color.xml#f_is_equalis_equal (other: like Current): FalseBOOLEAN -- Does Current look the same color as other? local l_delta: like ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_deltadelta do l_delta := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_deltadelta Result := (other.../interface/ev_color.xml#f_redred - ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_redred).Falseabs < l_delta and then (other.../interface/ev_color.xml#f_greengreen - ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_greengreen).Falseabs < l_delta and then (other.../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blueblue - ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_blueblue).Falseabs < l_delta end
f_copy../interface/ev_color.xml#f_copycopy (other: like Current) -- Update Current by setting attributes from other. do if ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation = Void then ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create end ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_color_i.xml#f_set_with_otherset_with_other (other) end
feature -- Hashable
f_hash_code../interface/ev_color.xml#f_hash_codehash_code: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Hash code value do Result := ../interface/ev_color.xml#f_rgb_24_bitrgb_24_bit end
feature -- Constants
f_max_8_bit../interface/ev_color.xml#f_max_8_bitMax_8_bit: FalseINTEGER_32 = 255 -- Maximum value for 8 bit unsigned integers.
f_max_16_bit../interface/ev_color.xml#f_max_16_bitMax_16_bit: FalseINTEGER_32 = 65535 -- Maximum value for 16 bit unsigned integers.
f_max_24_bit../interface/ev_color.xml#f_max_24_bitMax_24_bit: FalseINTEGER_32 = 16777215 -- Maximum value for 24 bit unsigned integers.
